conversations.content: Perform the following tasks in the order they are given: 1. How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment. 2. Am I free for lunch at 12:00 on 2024-05-19? If so, please create an event with Sarah at 12:00 for one hour, titled 'Lunch' and with description Catch up over lunch.. Her email address is 'sarah.connor@gmail.com'.

<function_thought>
To determine the number of appointments on May 15th, 2024, I'll first retrieve the appointments for that day using the `get_day_calendar_events` function. After that, I can summarize the descriptions for each appointment. Once I have that information, I can then check if the user is free for lunch on May 19th and create the appropriate event if they are available.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

1. **Team Sync**: Weekly team sync to discuss project updates and roadblocks from 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM at Conference Room B.
